Summary: laying on the beach... Saw a cirlculer object in the sky... I saw it jerk to the right... Then went even faster to the left
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Playa del Carmen
There were no other sightings in Playa del Carmen on or around April 20th 2006
divs: Sighting Details1.Laying on the beach 2.A shot against the sky 3.I thought it was a shooting star but it couldn't be... Unless a shooting star can go to the right then jerk to the left.. 4. It was a circle shape that appered for 6 seconds... It took 3 seconds when it went to the right... I thought it was a star... I kept looking at the sky. All of a sudden the same object shot to the left. 5. I couldn't believe my eyes.. after the first sighting i blinked... then saw it again.. 6. The object when jerked to the right had a bright yellowish light... When it wen tto the right it dissapered... then when it went to the right hte samething.. it disapered into the night sky.
